AI Description: NumPy is a popular Python library that provides support for large, multi-dimensional arrays and matrices, along with a collection of mathematical functions to operate on these arrays.
Core Features: Efficient & Intuitive Array Operations, Support For Mathematical Functions Like Linear Algebra, Fourier Analysis, Random Number Generation, Etc., Integration Capabilities With C/C++ & Fortran Code, Tools For Array Manipulation & Data Analysis
General Tags: Python Library, Data Manipulation, Scientific Computing, Numerical Computing
